channel.title: INall
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INall, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Here’s what Elon Musk must do to become a Tesla trillionaire
item.description: Tesla proposes a $1 trillion pay package for Elon Musk, if can stay focused on adding $7.5 trillion to the company’s value.

item.title: Tesla shareholders to vote on investing in Musk’s AI startup xAI
item.description: A shareholder proposal would allow Tesla to invest in Elon Musk's rival AI firm, xAI if approved. Tesla's board didn't recommend one way or another.

item.title: This Surprising Carb Can Help Your Sleep, Mood & Memory, Study Shows
item.description: And how to get more of it.

item.title: My friend and her second husband own property. How do her kids from her first marriage get their fair share?
item.description: “They are joint tenants with the right of survivorship.”

item.title: Scale AI’s former CTO launches AI agent that could solve big data’s biggest problem
item.description: Isotopes, co-founded by Arun Murthy, launched a sophisticated analytics agent. Arun was one of the creators of Hadoop who later joined Scale AI.

item.title: Ice Spice, Latto Twerk for Kai Cenat During 'Mafiathon 3' Bonanza
item.description: Kai Cenat was overloaded with butterscotch booty thanks to Latto and Ice Spice's unified twerking during "Mafiathon 3"!!! The superstar rappers were l...

item.title: OpenAI hires the team behind Xcode coding assistant Alex Codes
item.description: The team behind Alex Codes, which built a popular tool that let devs use AI models within Apple's development suite Xcode, is joining OpenAI.

item.title: Donald Trump Cracks Joke About Online Death Rumors at Tech Dinner
item.description: Donald Trump's clearly in good spirits despite recent gossip of his impending death ... cracking jokes about the unfounded rumors during a recent tech...

item.title: Judge Judy Says Women Should Earn Their Own Money, Otherwise Men Can Control Them
item.description: Judge Judy doesn’t play. She's got a message for women -- if a woman can’t make her own money, she’s basically handing someone else the remote control...

item.title: Oh, So *This* Is Why I'm So Prone To Hang Nails + The Best Solutions
item.description: Here's the 101 on hangnails from causes to treatment and prevention so you can be prepped and ready next time one pops up.

item.title: More elbow room in the sky: How to buy a second seat for yourself on US airlines
item.description: There are a number of reasons why you may want to buy yourself a second seat. Here's how to do just that on a variety of U.S. airlines.

item.title: This Is The #1 Habit For Heart Disease Prevention, Says Longevity Physician
item.description: The path to a healthy heart starts with one thing.

item.title: U.S. unemployment rate jumps to nearly 4-year high as weak job creation in August tees up Fed rate cut
item.description: The economy added a lackluster 22,000 new jobs in August and the unemployment rate rose to a nearly four-year high, underscoring the increasing fragil...

item.title: ‘Her kids will have no inheritance’: Will my friend lose her house to Medicaid if she goes into a nursing home?
item.description: “She would like to leave her kids something after she dies.”

item.title: Broadcom is starting to look ‘eerily reminiscent’ of Nvidia. Both stocks are feeling the impact.
item.description: The company said it added a fourth customer for its custom chips. Some analysts now think the company’s AI revenue will double next year.

item.title: Trump's DOT cancels compensation for airline delays and cancellations
item.description: The Trump administration withdrew a Biden-era proposal to compensate passengers at least $200 when their flight is delayed or canceled.

item.title: The blueprint for lasting companies and communities with Discord’s Jason Citron and Campuswire’s Tade Oyerinde at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
item.description: When you design for people instead of institutions, you don’t just build a product. You build a movement. That’s the idea behind this Builders Stage s...

item.title: A Hall Of Fame Quarterback Shares His Longevity-Supporting Routine
item.description: At age 55, he feels healthier than ever.

item.title: The Doomers Who Insist AI Will Kill Us All
item.description: Eliezer Yudkowsky, AI’s prince of doom, explains why computers will kill us and provides an unrealistic plan to stop it.

item.title: Maximize the Citi Trifecta: Earn and redeem Citi ThankYou Rewards points with 3 cards
item.description: Learn more about the high value of adding the Citi Trifecta, combining the earning power of the Double Cash, the Custom Cash and a Strata card.
